definitions.definition: A protein derived through partial hydrolysis of the collagen extracted from animal skin , bones , cartilage , ligaments , etc.
An edible jelly made from this material.
A thin, translucent membrane used as a filter for photography or for theatrical lighting effects .

main_definition: A protein derived through partial hydrolysis of the collagen extracted from animal skin , bones , cartilage , ligaments , etc.
